snippet: A Dallas-area police officer was placed on leave after a video surfaced on social media that showed him throwing a teenage girl to the ground and drawing a gun on another at a pool party disturbance, officials said.
lead_paragraph: A Dallas-area police officer was placed on leave after a video surfaced on social media that showed him throwing a teenage girl to the ground and drawing a gun on another at a pool party disturbance, officials said.

headline.main: Texas Officer Suspended After Pulling Gun on Teenager at Pool Party
headline.print_headline: Texas Policeman Suspended After Pulling Gun on Teen at Pool Party
